person.persName: Bernard Mattingly (Meade County, Kentucky, factory hand and soldier)

body.p: Meade County, Kentucky, weaver, factory hand and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Mattingly. Father of Eliza J. Mattingly, Robert T. Mattingly, Ann M. Mattingly, Mary E. Mattingly, Martha Mattingly, and Phillip I. Mattingly. Weaver in Meade County in 1850. Factory hand in Meade County in 1860. Served in the Capital Guard Regiment (U.S.A) as a first lieutenant from July 5, 1864 to January 12, 1865.
